article_title: How Medicare Will Control Your Access To Drugs

article_metadata.author: Scott Gottlieb

og.description: If you want to understand a President Hillary Clinton’s healthcare plan, look at the elaborate scheme that Medicare unveiled this week to give federal regulators the power to restrict use of prescription drugs. The plan contained all the elements Clinton already champions, and implemented the platform on which she can [...]
